T02D2547:18a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti bi dhi manda la n'a ma /
T02D2547:18a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2547:18a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2547:18a-5: dug gsum zhen pa'i 'khor ba'i gcod rnying la /
T02D2547:18a-6: 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal po las kyi mchog / ye shes sku can 'jam dpal de btud nas //
T02D2547:18a-7: las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chog bshad //
T02D2547:18a-8: de la spyir phrag dog gi gnyen por sangs rgyas
T02D2547:18a-9: don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed
T02D2547:18a-10: par 'dod pas / ji ltar 'gro ba'i don byed
T02D2547:18a-11: pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis srid pa'i grong khyer
T02D2547:18a-12: las brgal ba'i dgon pa'i gnas su rdzas dang mkho
T02D2547:18a-13: ba'i yo byad tshogs par byas la /
T02D2547:18a-14: stan bde ba la byams pa'i go ba gos la 'dug ste /
T02D2547:18a-15: mandala dang mchod pa bshams nas snying rje'i ya lad bgos te /
T02D2547:18a-16: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa bsal nas bdud kyi dpung rnams pham par byas nas /
T02D2547:18a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgron du spyan drangs la /
T02D2547:18b-0: @18b bstod pa byas la rnam pa thams cad dang
T02D2547:18b-1: ldan pa'i rgyu ba thams cad snang ba med par
T02D2547:18b-2: mos pa las / nam mkha'i khams su yi ge
T02D2547:18b-3: spro zhing 'dus pa las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs
T02D2547:18b-4: mos pa las / pa'i nang du / rdzogs pa'i
T02D2547:18b-5: sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i ye shes
T02D2547:18b-6: mos pa las / pa'i nang du / sems dpa'
T02D2547:18b-7: dang / rdzogs par byung ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba
T02D2547:18b-8: mos pa las / pa'i nang du / sems dpa'
T02D2547:18b-9: dang / dang / de dang cha mthun pa'i dkyil
T02D2547:18b-10: 'khor bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02D2547:18b-11: mtshan gyi byin rlabs las byung ba'i phyogs bcur sprul
T02D2547:18b-12: pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par
T02D2547:18b-13: bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas /
T02D2547:18b-15: lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'o //
T02D2547:18b-16: de la sems dpa' rigs dang mthun pa bzhis bskor ba /
T02D2547:18b-17: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02D2547:18b-18: bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2547:18b-19: sgo ba rnams mdzes par bris la /
T02D2547:18b-20: de rnams la yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2547:18b-21: lha'i snang ba thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis
T02D2547:18b-22: slob ma skal pa dang ldan pa bcug la dbang
T02D2547:18b-23: bskur te / yon gyi mchog blangs nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gnang ba byin te /
T02D2547:18b-24: dkyil 'khor lha la yang dag par mchod nas gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2547:18b-26: phrag dog don yod grub pa yi //
T02D2547:18b-27: dkyil 'khor cho ga bris pa las //
T02D2547:18b-28: bsags pa'i dge des 'gro ba kun //
T02D2547:18b-29: don yod grub pa nyid 'grub shog / don yod
T02D2547:18b-30: grub pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
T02D2547:18b-31: / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa
T02D2547:18b-34: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
